forecast.name: Today
forecast.shortForecast: Mostly Sunny then Isolated Rain Showers
forecast.detailedForecast: Isolated rain showers after 5pm. Mostly sunny. High near 73, with temperatures falling to around 71 in the afternoon. West northwest wind 8 to 13 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 39. North northeast wind 6 to 15 mph, with gusts as high as 22 mph.
